required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Major Adverse Cardiac Events After Carotid Endarterectomy
clinical_study.official_title: Incidence of Postoperative Major Adverse Cardiac Events in the Patients Underwent Carotid Endarterectomy: A Single Center Retrospective Study

brief_summary.textblock: Carotid endarterectomy is the operation for curing the significant carotid artery stenotic patients who are also at high cardiac risk. This retrospective study is to find out the incidence and risk factors related.

detailed_description.textblock:
The investigator plan to retrospectively investigate 175 carotid endarterectomy patients in Siriraj hospital to find the incidences of major adverse cardiac events, including
- Myocardial infarction is defined as rising of cardiac bio-markers in the setting of myocardial ischemia (Relevant anginal symptoms, ECG changes or Imaging e.g. Echocardiography)2,10
- Significant arrhythmia is defined as symptomatic or causing hemodynamic changes without other explainable causes.
- Heart failure is defined according to Modified Framingham criteria3
- Cardiac death is defined as mortality in association and as a direct result from myocardial infarction, arrhythmia or heart failure
if possible, the investigators will try to find the associate or risk factors for those events.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of major adverse cardiac events after carotid endarterectomy
primary_outcome.description: Major adverse cardiac event included myocardial infarction, significant arrhythmia, heart failure and cardiac arrest

secondary_outcome.measure: associate factors with adverse cardiac event
secondary_outcome.description: Analysis of potential factors associated with major adverse cardiac event after carotid endarterectomy
respiratory complications, such as re-intubation, aspiration Neurologic complication, such as stroke length of hospital stay, ICU admission, length of ICU stay

study_pop.textblock: The carotid stenotic patents scheduled for carotid endarterectomy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Every patients undergoing carotid endarterectomy in Siriraj hospital
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with other simultaneous surgery with carotid endarterectomy

results_reference.citation: 1. Mutirangura P et al. J Med Assoc Thai 2016; 99 (7): 785-93. 2. Boulanger M et al. Stroke. 2015 Oct;46(10):2843-8. 3. McKee PA et al.
